product_name: Timbuk2 Colby Cycling Shoulder Bag - Women's
long_description: Designed to be worn over the shoulder or cross body, the Timbuk2 Colby Cycling Shoulder Bag also has tuck-away straps for attaching to your handlebars for a smooth arrival or getaway. An external zipper enables access to its main compartment while riding, and subtle reflective hits on the side boost visibility on post-meal rides home. Large enough to carry your phone, cards, keys and a light scarf, the Timbuk2 Colby Cycling Shoulder Bag keeps it light and fun. Top flap closure with coated liner protects against urban residue. Reflective print on sides.
short_description: Designed to be worn over the shoulder or cross body, the Timbuk2 Colby Cycling Shoulder Bag also has tuck-away straps for attaching to your handlebars for a smooth arrival or getaway.
